      Horizontal alignment of the label.
      java.util.ArrayList boxesToAvoid
      An array of boxes to avoid when laying out the labels.
      java.lang.Boolean connectorAllowed
      Allow labels to be placed distant to the graph if necessary, and draw a connector line to the graph.

      If the label is closer than this to a neighbour graph, draw a connector.

      Enable the series label per series.

      For area-like series, allow the font size to vary so that small areas get a smaller font size.

      Draw the label on the area of an area series.

      java.lang.String verticalAlign
      Vertical alignment of the label relative to the plot line.
      java.lang.Number x
      Horizontal position relative the alignment.
      java.lang.Number y
      Vertical position of the text baseline relative to the alignment.

    • Field Detail

      • style

        public HIStyle style
        CSS styles for the text label. In styled mode, the labels are styled by the .highcharts-plot-line-label class. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-style/ : Blue and bold label

      • verticalAlign

        public java.lang.String verticalAlign
        Vertical alignment of the label relative to the plot line. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom". demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-verticalalign-middle/ : Vertically centered label accepted values: ["top", "middle", "bottom"] default: top

      • text

        public java.lang.String text
        The text itself. A subset of HTML is supported.

      • align

        public java.lang.String align
        Horizontal alignment of the label. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right". demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-align-right/ : Aligned to the right default: left

      • textAlign

        public java.lang.String textAlign
        The text alignment for the label. While align determines where the texts anchor point is placed within the plot band, textAlign determines how the text is aligned against its anchor point. Possible values are "left", "center" and "right". Defaults to the same as the align option. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-textalign/ : Text label in bottom position

      • y

        public java.lang.Number y
        Vertical position of the text baseline relative to the alignment. Default varies by orientation. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-y/ : Label below the plot line

      • x

        public java.lang.Number x
        Horizontal position relative the alignment. Default varies by orientation. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-align-right/ : Aligned 10px from the right edge

      • rotation

        public java.lang.Number rotation
        Rotation of the text label in degrees. Defaults to 0 for horizontal plot lines and 90 for vertical lines. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/xaxis/plotlines-label-verticalalign-middle/ : Slanted text

      • useHTML

        public java.lang.Boolean useHTML
        Whether to [use HTML](http://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-concepts/labels- and-string-formatting#html) to render the labels. default: false

      • minFontSize

        public java.lang.Number minFontSize
        For area-like series, allow the font size to vary so that small areas get a smaller font size. The default applies this effect to area-like series but not line-like series.

      • maxFontSize

        public java.lang.Number maxFontSize
        For area-like series, allow the font size to vary so that small areas get a smaller font size. The default applies this effect to area-like series but not line-like series.

      • enabled

        public java.lang.Boolean enabled
        Enable the series label per series.

      • connectorNeighbourDistance

        public java.lang.Number connectorNeighbourDistance
        If the label is closer than this to a neighbour graph, draw a connector.

      • onArea

        public java.lang.Boolean onArea
        Draw the label on the area of an area series. By default it is drawn on the area. Set it to false to draw it next to the graph instead.

      • boxesToAvoid

        public java.util.ArrayList boxesToAvoid
        An array of boxes to avoid when laying out the labels. Each item has a left, right, top and bottom property.

      • connectorAllowed

        public java.lang.Boolean connectorAllowed
        Allow labels to be placed distant to the graph if necessary, and draw a connector line to the graph.
